page.title: 08Educational Technology
page.content: In our school we have a colour television for school programmes and also used as a monitor for a{ZX {Spectrum}computer; a{BBC}computer, extensively used from primary one to seven, is used daily for multiplying tables and other programmes such as{ {Ordnance Survey}and {Drag Race.}We have a Carousel projector and tape recorder which produce and run tape/ slide sequences automatically. We also have a radio/cassette recorder which we use for a wide range of programmes. For music we have a piano,a full set of recorders and a wide range of percusion instruments. In school we range from counters and shapes to micrometers and clinometers;from alphabetical charts to charts and satellite pictures of the{North Sea} oilfields.Video cameras and recorders are readily available to the school.
